A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a relatively new Star Wars fan I went into this movie with pretty much no expectations. Yes\, there was excitement but after the Force Awakens I pretty much put this franchise on the backburner. However\, I loved the movie\, so much so that I went to see it two days in a row. The plot had some issues with pacing\, but the movie was interesting and fresh and definitely made me crave more. Since I've seen the movie there hasn't been a day that I haven't watched at least one video related to Star Wars and because of that\, I would like to thank Rian Johnson for giving me that crazy rush and a borderline obsession with the new franchise.
